sentences.en: I have been very remiss in writing to you.
sentences.cn: 我不曾写信给你,实在疏忽之至.

sentences.en: I would be remiss if I did not do some-thing about it.
sentences.cn: 如果我对此不做点儿什么，就是不负责任。

sentences.en: I would be remiss if I did not do something about it.
sentences.cn: 如果我对此不做点儿什么，就是不负责任。

sentences.en: I've certainly been remiss about things.
sentences.cn: 我也真是,办事就是不周到.

sentences.en: If I have been at all remiss, please accept my full apologies.
sentences.cn: 如有怠慢之处, 请多包涵.

sentences.en: It was remiss of him to forget her birthday.
sentences.cn: 他竟忘了她的生日,实在是糊涂.

sentences.en: Last but not least , it would be remiss not to mention Rockets assistant coach Tom Thibodeau.
sentences.cn: 最后, 我们还必须说一下火箭队的助理教练希波杜,这一点也很重要.

sentences.en: Malaysian authorities also failed to detect anything remiss when the cargo passed through Port Klang.
sentences.cn: 当这批货物通过巴生港口时,马来西亚当局也未能发现任何疏漏之处.

sentences.en: No policeman ought to be remiss in his duties.
The owner of the stolen car was himself remiss. He left the keys the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 被盗汽车的主人自己也有责任, 他把车钥匙丢在车上了.

sentences.en: You have been very remiss in fulfilling your obligations.

words.tran_cn: 宽恕；免除；减轻；传送；使恢复原状
怠慢的；迟缓的；不小心的

trans.tran_en: careless because you did not do something that you ought to have done
